short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best extension for generating cool and fancy fonts with one click copy option.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝔽𝕠𝕟𝕥 𝔾𝕖𝕟𝕖𝕣𝕒𝕥𝕠𝕣 : Generate cool and stylish text fonts with one click copy option which you can use on different social media platforms.

With the help of this extension you can convert your normal text to cool looking text fonts. Different types of fonts can be generated like:

1. Discord Fonts
𝘋𝘪𝘴𝘤𝘰𝘳𝘥 𝘍𝘰𝘯𝘵𝘴

2. Cursive Fonts
𝒞𝓊𝓇𝓈𝒾𝓋𝑒 𝐹𝑜𝓃𝓉𝓈

3. Vaporwave Fonts
【﻿Ｆｏｎｔ　Ｇｅｎｅｒａｔｏｒ】

4. Bold Fonts
𝐁𝐨𝐥𝐝 𝐅𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐬

and much more...

These generated fonts can be used in all types of social media like Instagram for creating stand out bios, chatting on Facebook, writing impressive tweets on Twitter and so on..

How to use Font Generator?

Using this Font Generator extension is super easy, just type or paste your text in the text input area and it will automatically get converted to different cool fonts. Then you can select your desired font and just click on that font, it will get copied and you can use this font anywhere you want.
